channel.title: Docker on Brian Z
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Brian Z

item.title: If you're not using Docker you should be
item.description: If you’re a developer and don’t live under a rock you’ve undoubtedly heard of Docker. There are many many sites out there which will tell you about how to use Docker and how to start using it…this will not be one of those posts. Rather, I’d like to write about some practical advantages about Docker which I’ve learned that weren’t super obvious when getting started. How does this intersect with building SAAS systems?
